Class AdvOval

java.lang.Object
  Shape
      TwoPointShape
          AdvOval
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AdvOval
extends TwoPointShape
implements java.io.Serializable

The AdvOval class implements methods necessary to manipulate AdvOval, extending the TwoPointShape abstract class.

See Also:
